data.title: Purrfect Crime (feat. Casey Desmond)
data.meta_description:
Purrfect Crime (feat. Casey Desmond) by Cat Temper, released 12 November 2020

If I had my way with you
I’d sit around and binge ya 
Sweep you off your feet
Like a sexy lil ninja
Waiting for my time to pounce 
Love the game of cat and mouse 
When I get you in my mouth
I swear you won’t be wanting out

Si tu me donne la lape 
Je serai ton chat fidele

Hey look what the cat dragged in 
I’ll treat you like my plaything 
Come on let the games begin
I know just what I’m chasing
I get hungry when I prowl
And guess who I’m prowlin’ now 
My paws, my jaws all over you 
Until you’re breathless in my jowls

I’ve got you backed against the wall 
I want it now, I want it all
Our hearts combine, this is our time 
Give yourself up to the night

The purrfect crime feels so divine 
You’re purrfect when you’re mine

I came out of nowhere
I’ve been watching from the shadows 
I bet you could use some love
You’re looking kinda sad though
Lick you up and spit you out
Show you what I’m all about 
Squeeze me
Please me
Don’t go easy
Kitty cat girl soundin’ cheesy

I’ve got you backed against the wall 
I want it now, I want it all
Our hearts combine, this is our time 
Give yourself up to the night

The purrfect crime feels so divine 
You’re purrfect when you’re mine 
Our hearts combine, this is our time 
It’s purrfect when you’re mine

It’s purrfect
So purrfect
You’re purrfect when you’re mine
